about_the_game:
Reviews

”…even in its current state, it’s already one of the more captivating multiplayer shooters on Steam right now.” IGN

“BattleBit has echoes of what Eric Barone did with Stardew Valley: a small game that punches above its weight and wins people over with unexpected depth and quality.” PC Gamer

“If you’ve grown tired of extraction shooters and battle royale games and crave something more focused on gunplay, combat, and just having fun over grinding and seasons, I’d recommend BattleBit Remastered.” Kotaku

About this game

Dive into chaotic, large-scale FPS battles with up to 254 players in BattleBit Remastered! Whether you're storming enemy positions with Assault or building critical defences as support, every role counts in this low-poly, adrenaline-pumping battleground. Squad up with open VOIP and level cities with fully destructible environments. Ready to experience the ultimate team-based warfare?

Primary features

  • Destructible Environments 

    Tear down walls, collapse buildings, and reshape the battlefield with dynamic 'levolution' mechanics, where every action leaves a lasting impact on the world around you!

  • Fully customizable weapons (WIP) Tailor your arsenal to your playstyle in BattleBit Remastered! Modify everything from scopes to grips or barrels to mags. Create the perfect weapon loadout to dominate every battleground.

  • 254 Player servers Join the chaos with up to 254 players in epic, large-scale battles! BattleBit Remastered offers massive multiplayer servers where proximity-based voice chat brings every encounter to life! Coordinate strategies or taunt the enemy as you fight for control in the ever-evolving battleground!

  • Vehicular combat with tanks, helicopters, transports, and sea vehicles. Dominate the battlefield with an arsenal of vehicles at your command! From tanks and helicopters to transports and sea vessels, BattleBit Remastered delivers intense vehicular combat that adds new layers of strategy and chaos to every fight.

content_descriptors.notes: BattleBit Remastered features action based, military themed gameplay. As a result, there are displays of combat and war. Gunfire, explosions, death. There is no gore, and visual display of violence is not exaggerated.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTS 450 or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Generation and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 600 Series or equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: BattleBit Remastered is a low-poly, massive multiplayer FPS, supporting 254 players per server. Battle on a near-fully destructible map with various vehicles!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Belarusian, Estonian, Macedonian, Serbian, Slovak, Swedish
